trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Si comporta come un contenitore di un gruppo di attività che viene eseguito quando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> inizia l'esecuzione.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> si comporta come una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> di tutte le attività che contiene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Le classi <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> possono essere incluse in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Se esiste una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> in una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> è la prima attività che viene eseguita quando <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> inizia l'esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: In qualche modo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> è simile a un gestore `OnEnterState`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: L'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> è un'attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vale a dire che l'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> può contenere altre attività.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> non può contenere n'attività che implementa l'interfaccia <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>, che include tutte le attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> e l'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> viene eseguito nell'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> in un modo non bloccante che predispone l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> alla ricezione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> può contenere un'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>, in modo da poter modellare una macchina a stati in cui si verificano transizioni da stato a stato senza ricevere alcun evento.

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: In tal senso la macchina a stati si comporta come un flusso di lavoro sequenziale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare una nuova istanza di un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK State Initialization.
Per altre informazioni, vedere [stato di inizializzazione esempio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9053202f-2567-4428-a4a2-85423963646b).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> mediante il nome dell'attività.
